original_title: When Porn Stars Play: More Than She Expected!
overview: Two British male porn stars Steve Hooper and Tony de Sergio have fun in a mountain village in Austria. They find girls and convince them to have sex. Lots of double penetration scenes but it's really hard to say anything about some plot.
tagline: See what happens when a dozen British and European pornstars are let loose on the slopes of the French Alps.
title: When Porn Stars Play: More Than She Expected!
